name: Red Force
text: Activate: Main You may rest this stage: If your leader has the (Red Hair Pirates) type, give up to one of your opponent's characters -1000 power for this turn.

effect.text: You may rest this stage: If your leader has the (Red Hair Pirates) type, give up to one of your opponent's characters -1000 power for this turn.
conditions: your leader has the (Red Hair Pirates) type
